meanings.definition: To visit or tour places of interest as a tourist.
meanings.sent1: She sightsees in the city to see famous landmarks.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, the family sightsees in different countries.
meanings.sent3: The cat sightsees around the neighborhood, curious about everything.
meanings.sent4: His mind sightsees through memories of past travels.
meanings.sent5: The bird sightsees from high above, enjoying the view.

meanings.definition: A person who visits or tours places of interest as a tourist.
meanings.sent1: The sightsees was excited to explore the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: Many sightsees gathered at the museum for a guided tour.
meanings.sent3: The little sightsees carried a map and binoculars on the trip.
meanings.sent4: The sightsees was lost in the beauty of the scenic landscape.
meanings.sent5: Each sightsees had a camera to capture special moments.
